About me:

Hi, I'm Victor Liu, a candidate for a bachelors of Computer Science from the University of Waterloo, a school most known for their Canadian Geese!

I'm a frontend developer with a passion for design. I love making things look pretty. I also love making things work.

When I'm not coding, I'm an avid leatherworker and fish keeper!

For more information: resume.pdf.
